metadata.synopsis: Auntie Ethel appears to be a charmingly roguish old lady selling potions in the grove. She is actually a hag in disguise. The player can explain what happened with the tadpole and Ethel offers to meet them at her home in order to 'help them'. The player can also get poison from her for the goblin camp, but she asks them to do her a favour instead.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: Hello, petal! Need anything? Any lotions or potions?
46.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and sincere. This is her second time meeting the player. Acting like they're friends already.

216.speaker: Player
216.text: I need help. I've been infected by a mind flayer parasite.

81.text: Ah, if it isn't the talk o' the camp?
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling. NodeContext: Meeting player for the first time. Knows you fought off goblins. Loud and charming and cheerful. About to congratulate your efforts.

52.text: It's a rare day I see one of you lot about. Thank goodness you came along when you - oh!
52.context: NodeContext: Deep concern at Oh! She's just noticed something 'wrong' with the player. Emphasis on 'goodness'.

29.text: Interesting to see you strutting about in the sun. Ain't seen that before, and Auntie Ethel's seen her fair share.
29.context: NodeContext: Said with a sly smile. She knows you're a vampire.

106.text: Still, you're looking a little pasty, love. I've just the thing to perk you up.
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the hag bustling about, picking up bottles, shaking her head, shuffling things around at her workbench. NodeContext: Reserved curiosity, she knows you're undead but doesn't want to say.

220.speaker: Player
220.text: There's no need. I'm fine, really.
220.context: NodeContext: Player has turn down her offer of a potion. She looks hurt and embarassed, she was only trying to help.

148.text: Sorry, love. I just lose the run of myself sometimes.
148.context: NodeContext: Player has turn down her offer of a potion. She looks hurt and embarassed, she was only trying to help.

140.text: I must say, though - you're looking mighty peaky.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I don't really know what's wrong with me, that's the problem.
0.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

204.text: Then let old Auntie Ethel have a look at you. First things first - tell me what's at you.
204.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

196.speaker: Player
196.text: Sometimes I think terrible things. Really, really, really terrible things.
196.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

37.text: Oh, petal, that's how it starts you know - thinking is only a step away from doing.
37.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

20.text: Were you hurt recently? An accident of some sorts? That could explain things.
20.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

133.speaker: Player
133.text: I don't know... I just don't know.
133.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

142.text: Shhh, it's all right - all you need is a bitta loving care, don't you think?
142.context: NodeContext: affectionate, shhh is calming, like she's soothing a baby

139.text: If I was back I'd my teahouse, I'd make you a cuppa and tell you to put your feet up. Alas, here I can only tell you to be kind to yourself, petal.

30.text: And encourage you to browse my bits and pieces, of course. Let me know if anything catches your eye - myself included.
30.context: NodeContext: cheeky wink - flirting with player

107.speaker: Player
107.text: Thank you - for being nice to me.

31.text: Sure what else am I here for? Bye now, petal.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: A mind flayer parasite infected me.
126.context: NodeContext: player viciously threatened her and she's delighted. Affectionate

78.speaker: Player
78.text: An illithid tadpole wormed into my head... but the others don't have symptoms like me.
78.context: NodeContext: player viciously threatened her and she's delighted. Affectionate

145.speaker: Player
145.text: All I know is that right now, I'm imagining drowning you in the boiling stew over there.
145.context: NodeContext: player viciously threatened her and she's delighted. Affectionate

177.text: Oh, you cheeky pup! That might scare someone else, but I know what naughty kids need - a bitta love and care.
177.context: NodeContext: player viciously threatened her and she's delighted. Affectionate

206.speaker: Player
206.text: I never sleep. Every night, I endure hours of slaughter in my dreams.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I know nothing of my past, and my brain feels thick as a bog.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I lost all of my past memory, and worse: I keep losing new parts of it.

54.text: Now that's as serious as serious gets. Our past defines us, petal. Without it - why, we could be anyone!

213.speaker: Player
213.text: There's a depraved creature that tells me to do horrible deeds... I wonder if he's a hallucination.

51.text: Oh, blessed Helm that sounds horrible. I don't know how I'd handle such a thing.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I've been better. It's... difficult to explain.
19.context: NodeContext: Preparing to launch into a story, cheery at the thought of the awful tale she's abotu to tell. Gossipy and dramatic.

166.context: NodeContext: Preparing to launch into a story, cheery at the thought of the awful tale she's abotu to tell. Gossipy and dramatic.

171.text: I once had a fella who'd been caught dabbling with a dryad.
171.context: CinematicNodeContext: She leaned in conspiratorially.NodeContext: Leaning in, enjoying this gossip and story. Dropping her tone at 'dabbling', putting emphasis on it.

195.text: The wife was none too pleased and introduced him to a pot of boiling oil.
195.context: NodeContext: Emphasis on boiling oil. Cheerfully telling this awful story.

146.text: But worry not! I fixed him up and, depending on the lighting, he looks good as new!
146.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and light, thinks she's made you feel better.

122.text: My point is - whatever ails you... I promise I've seen worse.
122.context: NodeContext: Thinks she's made you feel better. Concerned at the end. Hopes you'll open up to her.

99.text: She is not to know of the... our ailment. Only a gith healer may make us pure.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.text: She is not to know of the... our ailment. Only a gith healer may make us pure.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: Something doesn't add up about this one. Don't tell her anything.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

198.text: What is it, petal? What's wrong?
198.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

185.text: What is it, petal? What's wrong?
185.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

28.speaker: Player
28.text: There's something awful about my instincts, about my desires.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

212.speaker: Player
212.text: I've got a mind flayer parasite in my head.
212.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Auntie Ethel nodding along as if the

165.speaker: Narrator
165.text: *As you recount your adventure, Auntie Ethel nods along - her eyes wide.*
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: She clutches her chest, looking incredibly concerned and sympathetic. NodeContext: Deep concern and sounds sincere. Very worried about the player.

169.text: You poor pet. My heart goes out to you, truly.
169.context: CinematicNodeContext: She clutches her chest, looking incredibly concerned and sympathetic. NodeContext: Deep concern and sounds sincere. Very worried about the player.

141.text: But I confess, that doesn't explain all your symptoms. Some of the things you told me, why, I've never heard of a parasite doing that! This is serious.

62.text: I see no sign of a tentacle yet, but that could change in an instant. You need help, serious help.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking around, concerned as she tries to think of something. Shaking her head.

123.text: I've ne'er a potion or lotion here that could do it, but...
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking around, concerned as she tries to think of something. Shaking her head.

34.text: ...yes. I may have something at home!
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes light up. Smiles. NodeContext: Hope and cheer in her voice. She sounds like she genuinely wants to help.

144.speaker: Player
144.context: NodeContext: Hinting slightly that there's something else going on at her home, but very subtle. Like a slightly cheeky hint.

131.text: I've collected some... interesting bits 'n bobs over the years.
131.context: NodeContext: Hinting slightly that there's something else going on at her home, but very subtle. Like a slightly cheeky hint.

193.text: You'll have to stop by my house - just at the edge of the forest!
193.context: NodeContext: Trying to entice the player to come to her home, cheerful.

110.text: Let me mark it on your map. I'll be heading back soon, so I can meet you there.
110.context: NodeContext: Trying to entice the player to come to her home, cheerful.

149.text: Oh, and those potions you swiped from me? Keep them - call it a gift from your Auntie Ethel.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: My time could be running short. I can't afford to spend it paying you a house visit.
63.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Sounds worried and concerned.

41.text: I'm sorry, but I can't do much for you here. You could try asking around, but be careful.
41.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Sounds worried and concerned.

214.text: Most folk won't be as understanding of your little... problem.
214.context: NodeContext: Almost wincing at the word problem.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: That's precious little use to me, is it?
120.context: NodeContext: almost winking at just in case. Expects player to show up at her home, confident that she's baited them enough.

69.text: Why don't you pop by, and we can have a little chat about it? I do love me a handsome gentleman caller.
69.context: NodeContext: almost winking at just in case. Expects player to show up at her home, confident that she's baited them enough.

11.text: Especially if he has a... tentacle issue.
11.context: NodeContext: almost winking at just in case. Expects player to show up at her home, confident that she's baited them enough.

175.text: I'll be heading home soon. Here. Let me mark it on your map - just in case.
175.context: NodeContext: almost winking at just in case. Expects player to show up at her home, confident that she's baited them enough.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: That is a gracious offer, but I need an expert's help.
116.context: NodeContext: You've absolutely steamrolled the conversation and - near as you're concerned - you've settled the argument. This is no nonsense granny at it's finest.

72.text: Expert? Pfft. I'm more reliable than any of those eejits with 'credentials'.
72.context: NodeContext: You've absolutely steamrolled the conversation and - near as you're concerned - you've settled the argument. This is no nonsense granny at it's finest.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: No cure you offer can provide effective purification.
5.context: NodeContext: Getting into 'salesman' mode, is trying to entice the player to come to her home.

125.text: Stop by my place, petal. It'll be worth your while - I promise.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: This is beyond the skills of a backwater herb peddler.
130.context: NodeContext: Getting into 'salesman' mode, is trying to entice the player to come to her home.

22.text: Hah! I'm far more than a peddler, dearie. Surprised I had to spell it out - I thought you the observant sort.

199.speaker: Player
199.text: Does anyone fall for this innocent old lady act?
199.context: NodeContext: Getting into 'salesman' mode, is trying to entice the player to come to her home.

76.text: Hah! I'm far from innocent, petal. I was raising hell when you were still a spark in your mammy's eye.

152.text: Drop by for a visit, and I'll have a pot brewing. We can chat over a cuppa while I sort you out.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I doubt a simple potion will suffice. This problem calls for strong magic.
25.context: NodeContext: Getting into 'salesman' mode, is trying to entice the player to come to her home.

50.text: Petal, the things I've collected would blow your pretty little mind.
50.context: NodeContext: Getting into 'salesman' mode, is trying to entice the player to come to her home.

112.text: Bracelets that hold the power of ten men, mirrors that capture the soul...

35.speaker: Player
35.text: There is something strange about you.
35.context: NodeContext: The player has commented that there is something strange about her. She knows exactly what they mean but is feigning innocence.

105.text: Oh? Whatever do you mean, petal?
105.context: NodeContext: The player has commented that there is something strange about her. She knows exactly what they mean but is feigning innocence.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: You have a certain bearing. An almost fey-like quality.
71.context: NodeContext: Just casually insulted creatures most people fear. Unconcerned and dismissive. Cheeky.

153.text: Fey? I hope you're not calling me a dryad or, bless us and save us, one of those Eladrin - flightly buggers.
153.context: NodeContext: Just casually insulted creatures most people fear. Unconcerned and dismissive. Cheeky.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I detect something devilish, I think.
74.context: NodeContext: The player is trying to figure out what kind of magical creature she is. She's just purposefully misunderstood them and turned it into a cheeky compliment for herself. Cheeky and roguish.

134.context: NodeContext: The player is trying to figure out what kind of magical creature she is. She's just purposefully misunderstood them and turned it into a cheeky compliment for herself. Cheeky and roguish.

223.speaker: Player
223.text: Might you hail from Thay, perhaps?
223.context: NodeContext: She's just casually insulted incredibly powerful and evil people. Most are terrified of them. Sounds dismissive and unconcerned.

104.text: Like one of those Red Wizard lich-lickers? Please.
104.context: NodeContext: She's just casually insulted incredibly powerful and evil people. Most are terrified of them. Sounds dismissive and unconcerned.

174.speaker: Player
174.text: There is a touch of the wilds about you.
174.context: NodeContext: The player is trying to figure out what kind of magical creature she is. She's just purposefully misunderstood them. Cheeky and roguish.

163.text: Hah! I was quite the wild thing back in the day, but I'm afraid that's long past.
163.context: NodeContext: The player is trying to figure out what kind of magical creature she is. She's just purposefully misunderstood them. Cheeky and roguish.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: You have magic, but it feels... unusual. Are you a sorcerer too?
57.context: NodeContext: Player has asked if she's a Sorcerer. Cheerfully dismissive of immensely powerful people. Cheeky and roguish.

170.text: Not at all! Wouldn't have the patience for all that magical drama.
170.context: NodeContext: Player has asked if she's a Sorcerer. Cheerfully dismissive of immensely powerful people. Cheeky and roguish.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Do you have a powerful ancestor in your family perhaps? A winged one?
86.context: NodeContext: Cheeky wink at the end, having a laugh.

191.text: While I've done some mad things, I've never fooled around with a dragon. Well, not yet anyway.
191.context: NodeContext: Cheeky wink at the end, having a laugh.

221.speaker: Player
221.text: Have you ever accidentally blown something up?
221.context: NodeContext: being a cheeky granny. ethel has absolutely blown many people up

27.context: NodeContext: being a cheeky granny. ethel has absolutely blown many people up

36.text: I'm a simple woman, sweetie. Tea and potions are as exciting as it gets for these old bones.
36.context: NodeContext: Cheerful but a half smile in her voice. She knows the player suspects that she's not human, and is leaning into it.

132.text: But enough nattering. I'll be heading home shortly. Here. Let me mark it on your map.
132.context: NodeContext: Using this to entice the player to her home. Hoping to pique their interest. Cheerful and helpful sounding. Like she's doing them a favour.

190.text: One condition though - you swipe anything in my home? You'll lose a finger. Don't think I didn't notice.

217.text: I'd best get back to it, but you take care now, petal.

187.text: Why don't you come see for yourself? My home ain't far and I'll be there sharpish. Here. I'll mark it on your map.
187.context: NodeContext: Using this to entice the player to her home. Hoping to pique their interest. Cheerful and helpful sounding. Like she's doing them a favour.

219.speaker: Player
219.text: What harm? Show me your wares.

38.text: Be careful on the road - I'd hate if something happened to you. Take care, petal.

102.text: Be careful on the road - I'd hate if something happened to you. Take care, petal.

176.speaker: Player
176.text: There's nothing wrong, I swear. Everything's fine.
176.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

184.speaker: Player
184.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

93.text: Don't get your knickers in a twist. I was only asking.
93.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

56.text: Now, do you need anything? I have a few odds and ends for sale.
56.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: What harm? Show me your wares.
13.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

80.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

129.text: Nae bother, love. Come back any time!

227.text: Nae bother, love. By the way, I'll be heading home soon. Be sure to come visit, you hear?
227.context: NodeContext: Cheerful invite to her home. Acting like your best of friends. Is actually planning on trying to trap the player in her home.

109.speaker: Karlach
109.text: I hardly think a mad old woman's lotions and potions are going to cure us. We should keep moving.

202.speaker: Astarion
202.text: I love it! Let's tell her everything.

143.speaker: Wyll
143.text: Tell her. But if she pulls out a pot of oil, run!

192.speaker: Player
192.text: I'm fine. Just bone-weary after a difficult day.
192.context: NodeContext: Player has said it's been a difficult day. Gearing up to join the gossip. Excited to chat and have a bit of a moan.

200.text: Oh, stop. Even on a good day, half the camp acts like a bunch of screaming brats.
200.context: NodeContext: Player has said it's been a difficult day. Gearing up to join the gossip. Excited to chat and have a bit of a moan.

2.text: I'm tempted to smack them all on the backside and tell them to kiss and make up!
2.context: NodeContext: Full cheeky and roguish grandmother mode.

210.text: Not that they'd listen to little old me. Anyway! Do you need anything? I have a few odds and ends for sale.

21.speaker: Player
21.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

87.context: NodeContext: Smile in her voice. Friendly. Offering to show the player her wares.

115.speaker: Player
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: She laughs.NodeContext: Dissmissing her own talents but she knows she's very very good at what she does.

91.speaker: Player
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: She laughs.NodeContext: Dissmissing her own talents but she knows she's very very good at what she does.

178.text: Oh, nothing as fancy as that!
178.context: CinematicNodeContext: She laughs.NodeContext: Dissmissing her own talents but she knows she's very very good at what she does.

207.text: But I come from a long line of women with a dab hand at such things.
207.context: NodeContext: Hinting at her own magical origin, but very very subtle.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Well, aren't you a perceptive one, madam?
70.context: NodeContext: This line should be quieter. She knows you're a vampire, but doesn't want to say anything to break your cover.

61.text: I'm just curious about curiosities, is all. And you seem like quite the curiosity.
61.context: NodeContext: This line should be quieter. She knows you're a vampire, but doesn't want to say anything to break your cover.

136.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling as she holds out the bottleNodeContext: Triumph. She's found what she was looking for.

205.text: You take a sup of that and you'll feel right as rain, sweetie.
205.context: CinematicNodeContext: Big smile, fully confident the player will take it. NodeContext: Big smile as she says it. Sincere. Fully confident the player will take it.

117.speaker: Player
117.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and almost dismissive her own skills.

127.text: Oh, 'tis just a healing potion. Nothing fancy! Here.
127.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and almost dismissive her own skills.

138.text: You just look like you might need a pick-me-up.

203.text: I'm sorry to go on about it, but are you all right? You're looking awful peaky.

113.speaker: Player
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the player drinks the potion some kind of visual effect? A sparkle, warmth, something like when you drink a potion in game?NodeContext: Concerned grandmother mode. Fussing over the player.

85.speaker: Narrator
85.text: *As you down the potion, a comforting warmth spreads through you.*
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the player drinks the potion some kind of visual effect? A sparkle, warmth, something like when you drink a potion in game?NodeContext: Concerned grandmother mode. Fussing over the player.

161.text: Hmmm. I swear, you're still as peaky looking.
161.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the player drinks the potion some kind of visual effect? A sparkle, warmth, something like when you drink a potion in game?NodeContext: Concerned grandmother mode. Fussing over the player.

201.speaker: Player
201.text: Might this concoction also help with something more... serious?

164.text: Well that depends. What's wrong, lovie?

43.speaker: Player
43.text: I have a condition... an unusual condition.

151.speaker: Player
151.text: I'm tired, that's all. It's been a long day.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: It would be remiss of me to turn down a homemade brew. Thank you kindly.
39.context: NodeContext: Doesn't actually want the player to stop with the sweet talk. Bashful and delighted.

167.text: Oh, stop with the sweet talk. Here. Take the end of the batch. Just in case.
167.context: NodeContext: Doesn't actually want the player to stop with the sweet talk. Bashful and delighted.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: This is an expertly made healing potion. Nicely done.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: I've had such a pounding headache recently.
84.context: NodeContext: Ach is a noise of pain in sympath.

155.text: Ach, there's nothing like a pain in the noggin to addle you. You need to look after that head of yours.
155.context: NodeContext: Ach is a noise of pain in sympath.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: You could be friend or foe. Why should I drink anything you prepare?
53.context: NodeContext: This is knowledge most wouldn't know. Casually dropped it into the conversation, amused and mischevious.

157.text: I know githyanki make a habit of paranoia, but 'tis just a healing potion.
157.context: NodeContext: This is knowledge most wouldn't know. Casually dropped it into the conversation, amused and mischevious.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: A being like you knows of the gith?
59.context: NodeContext: Player asked how she knows of them, dodging the question with an amused comment.

96.text: Yes, and you're as grumpy as I remember. No offence, love but...
96.context: NodeContext: Player asked how she knows of them, dodging the question with an amused comment.

75.text: ...you don't look well. Are you all right?

16.speaker: Player
16.text: My health is my concern, not yours.

159.text: Ah, don't be grumpy, petal. I only want to help.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I am magic. If I can't cure myself, nothing you concoct will.
73.context: NodeContext: wry grin - ethel is poking the bear here and she knows it

168.text: Ohhh, someone's confident, aren't they? Be careful, sweetie. How's that saying go...
168.context: NodeContext: wry grin - ethel is poking the bear here and she knows it

208.text: ... the bigger they act, the bigger the whack?
208.context: NodeContext: Ethel is genuinely worried here but is also being sarcastic about the player's 'mighty magic'. Think mom being like 'yes, darling, i'm sure you can be a dinosaur when you grow up'.

94.text: Besides, that magic of yours, mighty as I'm sure it is, is falling a little short, isn't it? Something is wrong... I can smell it.
94.context: NodeContext: Ethel is genuinely worried here but is also being sarcastic about the player's 'mighty magic'. Think mom being like 'yes, darling, i'm sure you can be a dinosaur when you grow up'.

9.text: You or the dragon your blood hitched a ride with?
9.context: NodeContext: little bit sly, ethel is curious how the player will react to her gentle barb

14.text: I can smell it from here. Like iron and fire - delicious.

160.text: But something smells off, petal. Something is wrong, isn't it?

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Speak of me or my ancestor like that again and I'll incinerate you.

150.text: Oh, you're a saucy little spitfire, aren't you? Good. I like 'em that way.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: This power is mine and mine alone - make no mistake.

118.text: Good. That's how it should be.

66.text: You've power most can never dream of. I can smell it from here - like iron and fire. Glorious.
66.context: NodeContext: Admiration - wants the player to appreciate themselves

114.speaker: Player
114.text: Do you think I asked for this?
114.context: NodeContext: some real shock here - ethel admires the player and the power they wield

135.text: Well, why would you bloody not!
135.context: NodeContext: some real shock here - ethel admires the player and the power they wield

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Don't worry, my magic can fix me up! Probably.
60.context: NodeContext: wry grin - ethel is poking the player a little and is curious about what they'll say

215.text: Ah, yes, but will your magic cure your ills or turn you blue?
215.context: NodeContext: wry grin - ethel is poking the player a little and is curious about what they'll say

3.speaker: Player
3.context: NodeContext: laughing, being a pure cheeky grandmother

15.text: Hah! We're two peas in a pod, sweetie. What's life without a little fun, eh?

97.text: But your magic, and I say this with love, is falling a little short, right? Something is wrong - Auntie Ethel can always tell.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: True. Once, I finished a spell, blacked out, and woke up at a wedding. Great party, though.
10.context: NodeContext: laughing, being a pure cheeky grandmother

90.text: Hah! One time, I drank a bottle of mead so strong I tried to milk a chicken.
90.context: NodeContext: laughing, being a pure cheeky grandmother

100.context: NodeContext: laughing, being a pure cheeky grandmother

101.text: As much as I love a good natter, something is awry, isn't it? Auntie Ethel has a nose for these things.
101.context: NodeContext: smile as ethel tries to turn the focus back onto the player. very maternal here

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Real magic is chaos. Turning blue is a small price to pay for such power.
4.context: NodeContext: last line said with genuine pride and admiration - ethel likes sorcerers

211.text: And better blue than a wizard. Stuffy bastards spend more time talking about magic than they do casting. You're worth double 'em, petal.
211.context: NodeContext: last line said with genuine pride and admiration - ethel likes sorcerers

222.text: You're twitching something fierce, love. And your eyes! You look like you don't know the meaning of the word sleep.

40.text: There's an awful slump to those broad shoulders of yours, petal. Are you hurt? Cold? Feverish?
40.context: NodeContext: Full concerned granny mode. Saying these things before you even have a chance to answer.

121.text: Auntie Ethel will sort you out. I've lotions and potions galore!
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the hag bustling about, picking up bottles, shaking her head, shuffling things around at her workbench. NodeContext: Cheerful as she has someone to look after. Hasn't dawned on her that she hasn't let the player speak yet. A force of personality.

82.text: Lotions and potions for all ail - Oh, no!
82.context: NodeContext: Calling out about her wares, charming - concern at the oh no.

83.text: There's an awful slump to those broad shoulders of yours, petal. Are you hurt? Cold? Feverish?
83.context: NodeContext: Full concerned granny mode. Saying these things before you even have a chance to answer.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I have a... condition. But it's complicated.
